A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class game.Game
Overridden actionPerformed method, this is the main Controller method and also has some Model elements
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class game.ShipButton
 

C

checkShip() - Method in class game.ShipButton
Sets the appropriate good/bad colour of button and label according to value, and sets isNuked to true

G

game - package game
 
Game - Class in game
This class has the View and Model elements in the Game constructor and the Controller elements in the actionPerformed() method, it uses JComponents to build a battleship game.
Game() - Constructor for class game.Game
Default constructor which starts the game, it sets up the View and the Model elements
getValue() - Method in class game.ShipButton
Getter for value, used to calculate points/HP

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class game.Game
Main method, creates a Game() object
makeGuess() - Method in class game.RandomGuesser
Returns a random number from the ArrayList and removes it

R

RandomGuesser - Class in game
Class that simulates a random number generator
RandomGuesser(int, int) - Constructor for class game.RandomGuesser
Main constructor used

S

setColors(Color, Color) - Method in class game.ShipButton
Setter for colours, if the ship is nuked, sets colour accordingly, then repaints
setStrings() - Method in class game.Game
Sets the language for the game
ShipButton - Class in game
This class has elements from the Model, View and the Controller.
ShipButton(String, boolean, Color, Color, Color) - Constructor for class game.ShipButton
Main constructor used to create a ShipButton
showSolution() - Method in class game.ShipButton
Show the button's label and change it to the appropriate colour
